festival.introText: Mighty Hoopla unites London primo pop nights out Sink the Pink, Guilty Pleasures, Bongo's Bingo, Ultimate Power and many more for a super salacious big day out.

reviews.title: Review of Mighty Hoopla
reviews.body: This was the funnest event.  I only wish the music was much better. That said I'm looking forward to next year.

reviews.title: Review of Mighty Hoopla
reviews.body: Best atmosphere at a festival I have ever experienced... Could of had a few more bar staff available, but aside from that  couldn't of had a better day. Hope that next year lasts the whole weekend.

reviews.title: Review of Mighty Hoopla
reviews.body: Awesome day, the whole thing was fabulous and well planned. Felt very safe too.

reviews.title: Review of Mighty Hoopla
reviews.body: Mighty Hoopla was a fun and interesting festival.

faqs.question: When is Mighty Hoopla 2023?
faqs.answer: Mighty Hoopla takes place on Saturday 3rd June 2023.

faqs.question: How do I get to Mighty Hoopla?
faqs.answer: Mighty Hoopla takes place at Brockwell Park in Central London, and is easily accessible via the public transport network.

faqs.question: Where is Mighty Hoopla?
faqs.answer: Mighty Hoopla is located at Brockwell Park, London.

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Mighty Hoopla
reviewsDisplayFour.body: Best atmosphere at a festival I have ever experienced... Could of had a few more bar staff available, but aside from that  couldn't of had a better day. Hope that next year lasts the whole weekend.

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Mighty Hoopla
reviewsDisplayFour.body: Awesome day, the whole thing was fabulous and well planned. Felt very safe too.

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Mighty Hoopla
reviewsDisplayFour.body: Mighty Hoopla was a fun and interesting festival.

news.title: Mighty Hoopla brings pop superstars to London this summer
news.summary: The likes of Will Young, Years & Years, All Saints and more will come to the capital in June.
